result1: Blog Page is opened, user is able to see list of latest posts
step2: Select first post from post list – click post’s title
result2: User is successfully redirected to selected post’s page
step3: Scroll page to “Leave a Reply“ section
result3: “Leave a Reply” section is visible and form of adding a comment is visible as well
step4: In “Comment” text box, type comment content – could be “message from UI test”
result4: Typed text is visible inside “Comment” text field
step5: In “Name” text box, type name of user – could be “Test User”
result5: Typed name is visible inside “Name” text field
step6: In “Email” text box, type email address of user – could be testuser@email.com
result6: Typed email is visible inside “Email” text field
step7: Click on red, “Post Comment” button to finish commenting
step8: Scroll up a little, just above “Leave a Reply” section
result8: Latest added comment should be visible above “Leave a Reply” section, it also should contains data given in steps 4-6
